content.webTitle: Silicon Valley devastated by job losses

fields.headline: Silicon Valley devastated by job losses
fields.bodyText: "Santa Clara County lost 44,400 jobs from January 2002 to January 2003 -- a decline of almost 5 percent. Since the peak of the job market in December 2000, the county has lost 17.9 percent of its jobs, a total of 191,500," says the San Jose Mercury News.
